metadata.title: CVE-2024-21262 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors product of Oracle MySQL (component:Connector/ODBC).  Supported versions that are affected are 9.0.0 and prior.Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker withnetwork access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Connectors.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in  unauthorizedupdate, insert or delete access to some of MySQL Connectors accessible dataand unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS)of MySQL Connectors. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 6.5 (Integrity and Availabilityimpacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:L).

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-java package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
